energy.usef.core.repository

Class ConnectionGroupStateRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.repository.BaseRepository<ConnectionGroupState>
      • energy.usef.core.repository.ConnectionGroupStateRepository

  • public class ConnectionGroupStateRepository
extends BaseRepository<ConnectionGroupState>
    This repository is used to manage ConnectionGroupState.
